img_above_text:
Fungiman is armed with a giant staff and plenty of poisonous spores to surround you with. In addition to blunt attacks with the staff, make sure not to step on any of the poison gas on the floor. Making contact with the gas will start to poison you and eat away at your health. When casting Immobilize, wait until the ground is clear of poison so you can really lay it on him without worrying about getting poisoned at the same time.
## Fungiman Spirit
img_below_text:
* **Whirl**
* Equipped Effect: Moderately increases the recovery speed of Might.

img_summary:
1. The image showcases the "Fungiman" Spirit in the Equipment menu of a game. It highlights its rarity, high Qi cost, and its ability "Whirl," which allows the player to take the form of Fungiman and attack enemies with a spinning staff. The equipped effect moderately boosts the recovery speed of Might.  

2. The image serves to provide detailed information about the Fungiman Spirit, its combat utility, and its passive benefits, aligning with the preceding text's description of its abilities and the following text's focus on its equipped effect.
